description: Two men are fishing from a small boat on the surface of the ocean. Directly below them, a large shark with its mouth wide open is ascending towards their boat. One man expresses concern about hearing "eerie music," referencing a common cinematic trope associated with impending danger. The other man appears calm, seemingly unaware of the massive predator just beneath them. The scene juxtaposes a mundane activity with an immediate, life-threatening situation, creating dark humor through the characters' obliviousness to the visible peril.
caption: “There it goes again ... that eerie music.”
